named-query.name: Restaurant.findByName
named-query.query: FROM Restaurant WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', :name, '%') AND kitchen.id = :id

named-query.name: Restaurant.existsResponsible
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM Restaurant rest JOIN rest.responsibles resp WHERE rest.id = :restaurantId AND resp.id = :userId
